​【Please be sure to read】​
◆【Chiikawa Maison de FLEUR series (total of 15 types)】 cannot be ordered or purchased simultaneously with other Pre-orders start.If purchased together, your order will be canceled.Please understand.
◆Products on sale with Pre-orders start cannot be ordered simultaneously.Please order separately.
◆Cancellations after ordering Pre-orders start are generally not accepted.Also, we do not accept returns or exchanges of products without issues due to customer convenience.
◆Cancellations are generally not accepted in the case of delivery delays.Please understand.
◆You cannot specify the desired delivery date and time for Pre-orders start.Pre-orders start will be shipped in order as soon as preparations are complete.
◆Even if you specify the desired delivery date and time at the time of order, we may not be able to deliver as desired.If you are not present on the delivery date, a notice of absence from the delivery company will be provided, so please inform the delivery company of a convenient date and time for you.
​◆​【Not eligible for campaign】products.Nobility will not be enclosed, so please understand.
◆We do not offer wrapping services.Please understand.

Maison de FLEUR (Maison de Fleur) is a handkerchief with embroidery from Chiikawa, dressed up with a ribbon and a rose!The fluffy cotton material of Towel is highly absorbent and pleasant to the touch, making it a delightful point.Recommended as a gift as well as for personal use.

※Target age: 15 years and older
Size (approx.): H250×W250mmMaterial: 100% cottonMade in Japan
vendor: バンダイ（ファッション）

name: Chiikawa Chenille Woven Towel Handkerchief (Sasumata Blue)
description:
This is a luxurious handkerchief made from high-quality chenille fabric using soft-touch mohair yarn Towel.
Size:  Main body: Approx. H250×W250mm  Package: Approx. H280×W280mm  Weight: Approx. 80g  Material: 100% cotton (mohair yarn)  Made in China*Includes 1 piece*What is chenille fabric?Chenille fabric is a very labor-intensive textile that is warm and luxurious, created by cutting woven fabric into threads and weaving it again into a mohair-like texture.

name: Chiikawa Chenille Woven Towel Handkerchief (Rolling Red)
description:
This is a luxurious handkerchief made of high-quality chenille fabric using soft mohair yarn Towel.
Size:  Main body: Approximately H250×W250mm  Package: Approximately H280×W280mm Weight: Approximately 80g Material: 100% cotton (mohair yarn) Place of manufacture: China※ Contains 1 piece※ What is chenille fabric?It is a very labor-intensive fabric with warmth and luxury, created by weaving the fabric again using yarn that has been cut into a linear shape and made into a mohair state.

name: Chiikawa Chenille Woven Towel Handkerchief (Hachiware Lots Blue)
description:
This is a luxurious handkerchief made from high-quality chenille fabric using soft-to-the-touch mohair yarn Towel.
Size:  Main body: Approx. H250×W250mm  Package: Approx. H280×W280mm Weight: Approx. 80g Material: 100% cotton (mohair yarn) Made in: China*Contains 1 piece*What is chenille fabric?Chenille fabric is a luxurious textile that involves a very labor-intensive process, where the woven fabric is cut into strips and then re-woven using yarn in a mohair-like state, providing warmth and a high-quality feel.
